mapper.select: select ac.author_id authorId , ac.gmt_create gmtCreate, user.username authorUsername from article_comment as ac inner join user on user.id = ac.author_id where ac.id = #{id}

select ac.author_id authorId, ac.gmt_create gmtCreate, ac.content content, user.username authorUsername, user_info.avatar_url avatarUrl from article_comment as ac inner join user_info on user_info.user_id = author_id inner join user on user.id = ac.author_id where ac.to_article = #{articleId} and ac.is_delete = 0 order by ac.gmt_create
